body_html:
Hey, I tried out your branch, and I get this error:

RuntimeError: ConvNdBackwardBackward: expected 3 arguments (got 1) when calling loss.backward(). Where I am back propagating the gradient of ntwk w.r.t. input as is implemented here: https://github.com/caogang/wgan-gp/blob/master/gan_toy.py#L204.

Thanks for implementing this by the way! 👍

body:
Hey, I tried out your branch, and I get this error:

`RuntimeError: ConvNdBackwardBackward: expected 3 arguments (got 1)` when calling `loss.backward()`. Where I am back propagating the gradient of ntwk w.r.t. input as is implemented here: https://github.com/caogang/wgan-gp/blob/master/gan_toy.py#L204.

Thanks for implementing this by the way! 👍
